author: poojaranjan
content: If any project or infrastructure provider has any questions on the Merge testnet, please join the meeting. Zoom link will be shared before the meeting.

author: pipermerriam
content: I would advocate for decoupling and having a simple format for download and making sure that it is reasonably easy to transform that data into whatever fancy format you desire.

author: poojaranjan
content: For anyone interested to join, meeting starting in 15 mins
